preqs: MTH1020 or VCE Specialist Mathematics units 3 and 4 with a study score of at least 30

rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {GAS1615, MAT1020, MAT1080, MAT1085, MTH1030%}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ENG1005, ENG1091, MAT1085, MAT1812, MTH1035, MTH1085}

description: Solution of systems of linear equations using Gaussian elimination; matrices, determinants, eigenvalues and eigenvectors; introduction to vectors; methods of integration - substitutions and integration by parts; solution of first-order ordinary differential equations - separable, use of integrating factor; solution of second-order linear ordinary differential equations with constant coefficients and applications; Taylor series and series convergence; the remainder term.
